ppy/osu-tools.summary: Recent activities include the addition of an option to populate score parameters on `SimulateScreen` using score ID, with the relevant pull request being merged, showcasing ongoing efforts to enhance the tool's functionality and user experience.

ppy/osu-web.summary: Recent activities involve a proposed enhancement to include user tags in Beatmapset search, necessitating the creation of a new beatmap search index to support the inclusion of tags within the nested beatmap object for targeted searching.

ppy/osu.summary: A notable recent update is the implementation of the ability to mark beatmaps as played, following the successful merge of the corresponding pull request, which contributes to the game's usability and user interaction.

ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Ongoing activities focus on improving observability by integrating tools like Sentry and Datadog, along with the implementation of extended logging, aiming to enhance the submission process's transparency and performance monitoring capabilities.
